title.newValue: Outlook: Automatic file name replacement and permission management when sharing a file as a link

description.newValue:
The new Outlook for Mac will automatically shorten links and assign the file name for OneDrive and SharePoint files using the documentâ€™s name as URL. With this update you can also see and manage the files' permissions. Note: Legacy Outlook for Mac won't receive this update.
GA date: November CY2022
